languages.text: "Маршал ведет учет личного состава, так что вы правы, спросит. С цепью будет сложнее, Глейто их перекусывает. Но мы приложим все усилия, чтобы найти подходящую". {n}Отдав честь, проктор покидает палубу.{/n}

"The Marshal keeps personnel records. So, yes, it would. There might be a difficulty with the chains — Glaito bites clean through them. Still, we will try to find one that does the job." {n}The Proctor salutes and walks away.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Маршал ведет учет личного состава, так что вы правы, спросит. С цепью будет сложнее, Глейто их перекусывает. Но мы приложим все усилия, чтобы найти подходящую". {n}Отдав честь, проктор покидает палубу.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "The Marshal keeps personnel records, so, yes, it would. There might be a problem with chains — Glaito bites clean through them. Still, we will try to find one that would do the job." {n}The Proctor salutes and walks away.{/n}

"The Marshal keeps personnel records. So, yes, it would. There might be a difficulty with the chains — Glaito bites clean through them. Still, we will try to find one that does the job." {n}The Proctor salutes and walks away.{/n}

languages.text: «El Mariscal tiene un registro de personal, de modo que sí. Lo de atar a Glaito no será fácil, porque rompe las cadenas normales de un mordisco. Aun así, intentaremos encontrar una que sirva». {n}El Procurador se cuadra y se aleja.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Marshal keeps personnel records. So, yes, it would. There might be a difficulty with the chains — Glaito bites clean through them. Still, we will try to find one that does the job." {n}The Proctor salutes and walks away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «El Mariscal tiene un registro de personal, de modo que sí. Lo de atar a Glaito no será fácil, porque rompe las cadenas normales de un mordisco. Aun así, intentaremos encontrar una que sirva». {n}El Procurador se cuadra y se aleja.{/n}

languages.text: “元帅那边有人事记录，所以你说得没错。用链子拴格雷托恐怕会有困难，因为格雷托会把链子咬断。话虽如此，我们还是会想办法找一条足够结实的链子。”{n}索罗蒙向你敬了个礼，离开了。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Marshal keeps personnel records. So, yes, it would. There might be a difficulty with the chains — Glaito bites clean through them. Still, we will try to find one that does the job." {n}The Proctor salutes and walks away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “元帅那边有人事记录，所以你说得没错。用链子拴格雷托恐怕会有困难，因为格雷托会把链子咬断。话虽如此，我们还是会想办法找一条足够结实的链子。”{n}索罗蒙向你敬了个礼，离开了。{/n}

languages.text: « Le maréchal tient un registre du personnel placé sous ses ordres. Alors, oui, ma disparition soulèverait des questions. Quant à la laisse, je ne vous promets rien... Jusqu'à présent, aucune chaîne n'a su résister à la mâchoire de Glaito. Mais qu'à cela ne tienne, nous tâcherons d'en trouver une plus solide. » {n}Le proctor vous salue avant de s'éloigner.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Marshal keeps personnel records. So, yes, it would. There might be a difficulty with the chains — Glaito bites clean through them. Still, we will try to find one that does the job." {n}The Proctor salutes and walks away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Le maréchal tient un registre du personnel placé sous ses ordres. Alors, oui, ma disparition soulèverait des questions. Quant à la laisse, je ne vous promets rien... Jusqu'à présent, aucune chaîne n'a su résister à la mâchoire de Glaito. Mais qu'à cela ne tienne, nous tâcherons d'en trouver une plus solide. » {n}Le proctor vous salue avant de s'éloigner.{/n}

languages.text: 「将帥は人事記録を管理しているので、そうなるでしょう。鎖に関しては問題があるかもしれません。グライトはその鎖を簡単に噛み切りますから。それでも、役に立つものを探してみます」{n}代理人は敬礼し、歩いて去って行く。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Marshal keeps personnel records. So, yes, it would. There might be a difficulty with the chains — Glaito bites clean through them. Still, we will try to find one that does the job." {n}The Proctor salutes and walks away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「将帥は人事記録を管理しているので、そうなるでしょう。鎖に関しては問題があるかもしれません。グライトはその鎖を簡単に噛み切りますから。それでも、役に立つものを探してみます」{n}代理人は敬礼し、歩いて去って行く。{/n}

languages.text: "Miralayım çalışanlarının kayıtlarını tutar. Dolayısıyla kurcalayacaktır. Zincir konusunda bir sorunumuz olabilir... Glaito, zincirleri ısırıp koparır. Yine de koparamayacağı bir zincir bulmaya çalışırız." {n}Üsteğmen, selam verip uzaklaşıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Marshal keeps personnel records. So, yes, it would. There might be a difficulty with the chains — Glaito bites clean through them. Still, we will try to find one that does the job." {n}The Proctor salutes and walks away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Miralayım çalışanlarının kayıtlarını tutar. Dolayısıyla kurcalayacaktır. Zincir konusunda bir sorunumuz olabilir... Glaito, zincirleri ısırıp koparır. Yine de koparamayacağı bir zincir bulmaya çalışırız." {n}Üsteğmen, selam verip uzaklaşıyor.{/n}

languages.text: "Der Marschall führt über alles Buch. Insofern. Ja, das würde er wohl. Außerdem könnte es ein Problem mit der Ketten gebe ... Glaito beißt sie nämlich für gewöhnlich durch. Wir werden trotzdem versuchen, eine geeignete Kette zu finden." {n}Der Proktor salutiert und entfernt sich.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Marshal keeps personnel records. So, yes, it would. There might be a difficulty with the chains — Glaito bites clean through them. Still, we will try to find one that does the job." {n}The Proctor salutes and walks away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Der Marschall führt über alles Buch. Insofern. Ja, das würde er wohl. Außerdem könnte es ein Problem mit der Ketten gebe ... Glaito beißt sie nämlich für gewöhnlich durch. Wir werden trotzdem versuchen, eine geeignete Kette zu finden." {n}Der Proktor salutiert und entfernt sich.{/n}
